Prstan je bil skrbno varovana skrivnost
07 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Zlatica Kasal

Ameriški igralec Dennis Quaid, ki je 9. aprila dopolnil 65 let, je filmski svet presenetil z novico, da se utegne znova poročiti. Za roko je namreč med počitnicami na enem izmed havajskih otokov zaprosil Lauro Savoie, ki je kar 39 let mlajša od njega in je ženitno ponudbo tudi sprejela.



Dennis Quaid se je na Havajih zaročil z Lauro Savoie.  Foto: Profimedia

HONOLULU > “Zgodilo se je na najbolj severni točki otoka Oahu, v počitniškem naselju Turtle Bay. Vse je bilo zelo spontano, pravo presenečenje,” je medijem povedal ameriški filmski igralec, za katerega bo to najbrž že četrti zakon. Prav lani se je namreč po 14 letih zakona ločil od svoje tretje žene Kimberly.
Par sta že nekaj mesecev in kot kaže tudi močno zaljubljena. Dennis Quaid: “Ona je hotela posneti selfi, iz žepa sem potegnil prstan in jo vprašal, ali bi se poročila z menoj. Skoraj se je onesvestila.” Povedal je še, da se je na ta dogodek pripravljal kar nekaj časa, med počitnicami pa se mu je zdel pravi čas, da jo zaprosi. Želel si je namreč, da bi to bil njun poseben, intimni trenutek.
Novico o zaroki in bodoči poroki so njuni prijatelji kaj kmalu pokomentirali na družbenih omrežjih. Še zlasti za to, ker je Laura Savoie skoraj štiri desetletja mlajša od Dennisa. Njegova nekdanja zaročenka, ki ji pa večne zvestobe ni obljubil pred oltarjem, igralka Lea Thompson se je na twitterju pošalila: “Laura je imela šele deset let, ko sem bila sama zaročena z Dennisom. Ko sva se zaročila, sem imela 23 let, on pa 30. Vsaj mislim, da je bilo tako.”
Laura Savoie je doktorska študentka na eni izmed teksaških visokih šol, v prostem času se ukvarja tudi z jogo.

The ring was a carefully kept secret
07 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Zlatica Kasal

American actor Dennis Quaid, who turned 65 on April 9, was surprised by the movie world with the news that he may be remarried. Namely, during a vacation in one of the Hawaiian islands, Laura Savoie, who is 39 years younger than him, applied for a hand and also accepted a marriage proposal.



Dennis Quaid got engaged to Laura Savoie in Hawaii. Photo: Profimedia

HONOLULU> “It happened at the northernmost point of Oahu Island, in Turtle Bay. It was all very spontaneous, a real surprise, ”the American film actor told media, which is likely to be his fourth marriage. Just last year, after 14 years of marriage, he divorced his third wife, Kimberly.
The couple have been dating for a few months now and also seem to be deeply in love. Dennis Quaid: “She wanted to shoot a selfie, I pulled a ring out of my pocket and asked her if she would marry me. She almost fainted. ”He further said that he had been preparing for the event for quite some time, and during the holidays it seemed to be a good time to ask for it. He wanted it to be their special, intimate moment.
The news of their marriage and future marriage was soon commented on by their friends on social networks. Especially because Laura Savoie is almost four decades younger than Dennis. His former fiancée, who was not promised eternal loyalty at the altar, actress Lea Thompson joked on Twitter: “Laura was only ten years old when I was engaged to Dennis. When I got married, I was 23 and he was 30. At least I think so. ”
Laura Savoie is a PhD student at one of Texas' colleges and is also practicing yoga in her spare time.
